thread.title: Coors Field Here are the results
thread.title_full: Coors Field Map Game: Here are the results - The Denver Post

author: Joe Murphy
title: Coors Field Here are the results
text:
The percent of our readers who placed Coors Field within a mile of its actual location (40.3%) landed within bunting distance of the Colorado Rockies' current record (43 wins, 57 losses, 43.0%, fourth-worst in the National League). Paltry performance for a home-field game.
If you want to play the Coors Field map game, avert your eyes from the answer below and go play it .
Here are the game results, in map-form:
On mobile? View the map here
